text.div:
Human Genome Variation Society Sequence Variant Nomenclature Value Set

HGVS nomenclature is used to report and exchange information regarding variants found in DNA, RNA, and protein sequences.

  • Include all codes defined in http://varnomen.hgvs.org

name: HGVSVS
title: Human Genome Variation Society Sequence Variant Nomenclature Value Set
description: HGVS nomenclature is used to report and exchange information regarding variants found in DNA, RNA, and protein sequences.
